segments.text: The upper cabinets are open, revealing the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's labeled clearly, stuffed with treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy reaches in while balancing on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl faces him, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems patient for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: By the sink, water runs from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It overflows, pouring onto the cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms and widens on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries the plate, foot in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is neat despite the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden appears calm through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR
